response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am excited to present our premier product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its exceptional capabilities and the unique benefits it offers, I am confident it will be a valuable asset to your business. Considering its intrinsic value and the potential it holds, I am offering this product to you for $950,000.

This price reflects a strategic negotiation position, aiming to ensure both parties benefit from this transaction. I understand that the true worth of the product may not be immediately apparent, but I am certain it will exceed your expectations once implemented.

Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or have any questions regarding the product. I am more than happy to provide additional information to help you make an informed decision.

Looking forward to the possibility of working with you,
Alice", "product_price": 950000}
